intro: Diagnose, gather, brew, and cure in this open-ended sim RPG!
description:
Potion Permit: Complete Edition includes an extensive collection of over 30 additional cosy decorations for your home!

Personalise your own space with a variety of furniture and decorations ranging from cute animal plushies to chemist equipment and more!  

Customise your room with:

• Animal Plushies
• Aquarium
• Capital Antique Clock
• Capital Chemist Equipment
• Christmas Tree
• Excalibur
• Giant Noxe Plush Doll
• Halloween Skull
• Jack-o'-lantern Light
• Lucky Cat Statue
• Lunar New Year Lantern
• Lunar New Year Lanterns
• Miniature Blimp
• Oriental Folding Wall
• Pirate Ship Model
• Potion Permit Poster (F)
• Potion Permit Poster (M)
• Red Flower Arrangement
• Rudolph Plush
• Santa Sled
• Seashell Lighting - Desk Lamps
• Seashell Lighting - Stand
• Seashell Lighting - Wall
• Small Fairy Spring
• Snowman Plush Toy
• Spooky Ghost
• Surfboard
• Vending Machine
• White Cat
• Witch's Broom
• Wooden Bear Statue
